name: .TNL
summary: Learn about .TNL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: While TNL files are not meant to be opened outside Super Mario Maker, you can view the images they contain. To do so:
Use a hex editor, text editor, or the tnl_conv.py script linked below to remove your TNL file's proprietary header.
Rename your TNL file to use the .jpg extension.
Open the renamed file as you would any JPG file.
